item.description:
Hi Folks,
Sorry for the short notice on this, but I hope enough of the faithful will be able to make it to her really interesting paper that I talked Julie into presenting. The full title is "Getting to know the Dual-Systems Theory of Cognition: how this augments Instrumental Rationality and our outlook on Meaning in Life". I'll send the paper as an email attachment.
See you there!
Sean

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Julie presents her paper: "The D-P Theory and our sense of Reality"
